body.raw: Zaibul Nisa is a marketing professional with 5+ years working in the sustainable finance space. She is working at the intersection of climate change and Web3 where she builds communities and drives discussions around emerging technology and climate change. Currently, she is pursuing her MBA with a specialization in Marketing, Zaib wants to be a defining voice of digital marketers in the Web3 space.
